package.name: Joomla
package.info: Dynamic portal engine and content management system.

package.name: Wordpress
package.info: WordPress is web software you can use to create a beautiful website or blog.

package.name: Drupal
package.info: Drupal is an open source content management platform powering millions of websites and applications.

package.name: PHP-Nuke
package.info: Content management and portal solution featuring web-based administration, surveys, customizable blocks, modules and themes with multilanguage support.

package.name: ImpressPages
package.info: Web CMS built on PHP5.3 and MySQL. Efficient tool to create and manage websites. Add more value and peace of mind.

package.name: MyBB Forum
package.info: MyBB is a discussion board that has been around for a while; it has evolved from other bulletin boards into the forum package it is today. Therefore, it is a professional and efficient discussion board, developed by an active team of developers.

package.name: phpBB
package.info: phpBB is free and open source forum software that is easy to use, powerful, and highly customisable

package.name: bbPress
package.info: bbPress is forum software with a twist from the creators of WordPress.

package.name: Simple Machines Forum
package.info: SMF - The open source web based forums

package.name: b2evolution
package.info: Open source PHP/ mySQL weblog tool derived from the same code that later became WordPress. Supports multiple categories, sub-categories, etc...

package.name: osCommerce
package.info: A free online shop program featuring order history, shopping carts, full search capability, product reviews, secure transactions, bestseller lists, and related items.

package.name: Zen Cart
package.info: Zen CartÂ® truly is the art of e-commerce; free, user-friendly, open source shopping cart software

package.name: PrestaShop
package.info: Create your online store with PrestaShop's free shopping cart software. Build an ecommerce website for free and start selling online with hundreds of powerful features.

package.name: Magento
package.info: Magento is the eCommerce software and platform trusted by the world's leading brands.

package.name: 4images
package.info: 4images is a PHP and MySQL based system to administrate image galleries and media databases.

package.name: Gallery
package.info: Free, open source, photo management system. Photo management includes automatic thumbnail creation, image resizing, rotation, ordering, captioning, etc...

package.name: Coppermine
package.info: Coppermine is a multi-purpose fully-featured and integrated web picture gallery script written in PHP using GD or ImageMagick as image library with a MySQL backend.

package.name: Moodle
package.info: Moodle is a Course Management System (CMS), also known as a Learning Management System (LMS) or a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE). It is a Free web application that educators can use to create effective online learning sites.

package.name: Crafty Syntax
package.info: Crafty Syntax Live Help is a live support application. highlighted features include the ability to create your own questions, auto inviting visitors, referrer tracking, page tracking.. and more.

package.name: Hesk
package.info: Hesk is Free PHP Help Desk Software that runs with a MySQL database. It allows you to setup a web based ticket support system (helpdesk) for your website.

package.name: osTicket
package.info: osTicket is a widely-used and trusted open source support ticket system. It seamlessly routes inquiries created via email, web-forms and phone calls into a simple, easy-to-use, multi-user, web-based customer support platform.

package.name: DokuWiki
package.info: DokuWiki is a simple to use and highly versatile Open Source wiki software that doesn't require a database.

package.name: MediaWiki
package.info: MediaWiki is a free software open source wiki package written in PHP, originally for use on Wikipedia.
